title: Surviving Pay Phones Evoke U.S. Past
itunes:title: Surviving Pay Phones Evoke U.S. Past
description:
Bloomberg News Senior Editor for U.S. Health Care Drew Armstrong discusses how the fast-spreading delta variant has flooded hospitals across the South. Bloomberg City Lab Writer David Dudley shares his Businessweek Magazine story Surviving Pay Phones Evoke Lost U.S. Network of 2 Million. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Jenny Surane explains how Wall Street is back, just not the way industry executives had hoped. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne talks about George Soros saying BlackRock is on the wrong side of a 'life and death' conflict with China. And we Drive to the Close with David Dietze, Senior Portfolio Strategist at Peapack Private Wealth Management.

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Ed Ludlow. Producers: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
